aboutPage.title: Career journey
paragraphs: Passionate about computers from a young age, and after several years in administration without real career progression, I decided to transition into web development.

I first learned on my own before joining O’Clock school to deepen my skills. The training was divided into three parts: three months dedicated to learning the fundamentals of JavaScript development, followed by one month specializing in React.
The final month was dedicated to the creation of a professional project, in which I worked as a Front-End Developer.

contactPage.title: Stay in Touch !
contactPage.text: Want to chat? Feel free to reach out to me by email or phone!

projectsPage.subtitle1: A Pokémon card collection app to create, sort, and manage your card deck
projectsPage.subtitle2: Personal travel diary of my journey through Taiwan, sharing culture, food, and memorable places
projectsPage.subtitle3: A fun and interactive game to learn Mandarin characters, organized by HSK levels.
